name: Rubmat
body:
## Dependencies
```
commander >= 4.0.0
```
## Development Dependencies
```
bundler >= 1.0.0
commander ~> 4.1.0
jeweler ~> 1.8.3
rcov >= 0
rdoc ~> 3.12
shoulda >= 0
```
For new formulas or features send me a pull request
## Installing
```
$ gem install RubMat
```

after that if you want to fall into command line of rubmat, type:
```
$ rubmat
```
or if you want to use librbdiscrete provided by RubMat get in your
rubygems's gem directory and load modules via irb from folder lib/

Replace first command in MacOS with;
```
$ sudo gem install RubMat
```
## License
MIT

## Authors
Mahmut Bulut (mahmutbulut0@gmail.com)
tagline: Discrete Mathematics, Linear & Stochastic Systems Problem and Lemma Solver (Ruby Port)
